name: Katalina
description: This knight has left the Empire behind her, and now stands opposed to everything she once stood for. Bidding farewell to former allies, she dons the armor of her new roleâ€”knight protector. She raises her face to the sky, and swears that she will show her charge that great wide world.

name: Rackam
description: The hotshot helmsman girds himself in a new suit of armor as he prepares to guide the young skyfarers on the next leg of their journey. No one loves the ship more than he, and no one is more resolute in their determination to protect their friends.

name: Eugene
description: This crafty musketeer finally shares the regret he's kept to himself all these years. The very girl intertwined with all this would feel indignant for her mother. Yet he continues to wait in high hopes.

name: Rosetta
description: Rosetta hides the world's lies, as if covering a scent with perfume. Those in her vicinity may get hints as to the truth, but she herself will never tell, instead saying she hopes for a miracle, like any other person.

name: Vira
description: The knight of the primal beasts has returned to Vira's side to grant her even greater power, drawn as it was to her dark, burning passions. Crazed by her obsession, she uses her primal energies to cut down all who dare approach the object of her affection.

name: Orchid
description: A being that never expected to be, Orchid was given life by pure miracle and has questioned why ever since. On her quest for answers, she continues alone through the skies, vowing to one day reunite with those most dear to her.

name: Percival
description: Having conquered the trial of the beast, the Lord of Flames bears a new sword in his hand, but old convictions in his heart. With the help of his comrades, he will struggle on until the day his ideals leave the world of his dreams and enter the light of the sun.

name: Sandalphon
description: Having arisen from a deep, long slumber, this archangel has inherited the will of the supreme primarch, Lucifer. Though Sandalphon previously had no role to play, he now bears the burden of carrying out vengeance in hopes of fulfilling a promise.
